item.description:
This is a Cross Posting with the Wedeln Ski and Outdoors Club.

If you haven't been to Patriot Place, it is a wonderful array of Restaurants, Bars, Retail and of course, right next to Gillette Stadium - Home of the New England Patriots and New England Revolution. Since it provides plenty of parking and is easily accessible from I-95, I-495, and Route 1, the Wedelns would like to celebrate and have a Pub Crawl through it.

We will definitely end and spend the evening at Toby Keith's place.

I flipped the order of CBS Scene and Twenty 8 as it made more logistical sense!

September 29, 2012

3: 00 PM - Bar Louie
4:30 PM -  CBS Scene
6:00 PM - Twenty8
7:30 PM - Toby Keith's I love this Bar and Grill

Here are the details on each place:
Bar Louie - http://www.barlouieamerica.com/locations/Foxboro.aspx

CBS Scene - http://www.cbsscene.com/

Twenty8 - http://www.twenty8restaurant.com/

TK's I love this Bar and Grill - http://countrybarma.com/

See you on Saturday!

Regards,

Jonathan

 

Please RSVP using this link:


http://www.meetup.com/Wedelns/events/82394682/


Regards,
Jonathan
item.name: Patriot Place Pub Crawl
